title: Male league of legends player looking for internet relationship
body: My Op.GG makes bitches wet pm and add me on lol. Girls only. THOTS welcome. Pm me for discord link. Let have fun

replies.body:
Since this does not appear to be a legitimate thread of player recruitment we're going to go ahead and lock this thread. 

If you have any inquiries regarding this, feel free to reach out to the Wardens via the discord channel - Verification instructions can be found here -https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/qVlculPP-boards-moderation-discord

-Cosmos
